column6: 2015 at akron city hospital surrounded by his family. funeral service will be held saturday
column8: 2015 at 11 a. m. at macedonia baptist church
column12: pastor lorenzo glenn officiating. interment at glendale cemetery. friends may visit at the church from 10 a. m. until time of service. procession will form and condolences may be sent to 1251 weathervane lane #1d
column14: oh 44313. a gofundme. com account has been set up for donations. published in akron beacon journal from june 7 to june 11
